sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from "axios"; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; const baseUrl='http://127.0.0.1:8000/api'; function CourseDetail() { const [chapterData, setchapterData]=useState([]); const [courseData, setcourseData]=useState([]); const [teacherData, setteacherData]=useState([]); let { course_id } = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ try{ axios.get(baseUrl+'/course/'+course_id).then((res)=>{ setcourseData(res.data) setchapterData(res.data.course_chapter) setteacherData(res.data.teacher) }); }catch(error){ console.log(error) } },[]) return (

{courseData.title}

{courseData.description}

Course by: {courseData.teacher.full_name}

Duration: 3 hours 30 Minutes

Total Enrolled: 456 Students

Rating: 4/5

{/* Course Videos */}
Course Videos
  • Introduction 1 Hour 30 Minutes {/* Video Modal start */}
    BS:Video 1
    {/* Video Modal End */}
  • Setup Project 1 Hour 30 Minutes
  • Start with function 1 Hour 30 Minutes
  • Start with function 1 Hour 30 Minutes
  • Start with function 1 Hour 30 Minutes
  • Start with function 1 Hour 30 Minutes

Related Course

Course Title
Course Title
); } export default CourseDetail;
